Html:
Hi,

Have you ever thought / are there any plans to port this library tool to Windows Mobile Arena?
At a first glance, trying to deploy it on a Win Mob. 6 will give:

File or assembly name 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=B77A5C561934E089', or one of its dependencies, was not found.

Regards
